name: LoungeflyDe Kleine Zeemeermin: Ariel Fireworks Crossbodytas - Merchoid Nederland
description: Laten we eerlijk zijn: we wilden allemaal een zijn x20;zeemeermin op een bepaald punt in ons leven, en wie we beter kunnen meenemen x20;inspiratie van dan de iconische Ariel haarzelf? Met de Loungefly The Little Mermaid Ariel Fireworks Glow in the Dark Crossbody Bag, you can make a little bit of mermaid magic a part of your everyday life. This bag brings together everything we love about Ariel and her underwater world, with the added bonus of fireworks and glow-in-the-dark accents.Get ready to be the talk of any Disney outing with this crossbody bag. On the front, Ariel and her BFF Flounder are having a whale of a time (pun intended) as they discover a ship bursting with fireworks for Prince Eric&rsquo;s birthday. The starry sky in the background just adds to the magic. The special glow-in-the-dark feature means that even when the sun goes down, the stars and moon on the bag will continue to twinkle the night away. But wait, there&rsquo;s more! Flip the bag over and you&rsquo;ll see Sebastian the crab making an appearance, adding a little bit of cheeky pessimism to the mix.Not only is this bag visually beautiful, but it&rsquo;s also functional. The vegan leather (polyurethane) makes it cruelty-free and durable, while the adjustable straps and sturdy silver metal hardware ensure that you&rsquo;re not sacrificing comfort for style. Not to mention, the bag is an officially licensed Disney product, so you know you&rsquo;re getting the real deal. There&rsquo;s never been a better time to add a little bit of Disney magic to your life, so why wait? Dive into the world of Ariel and her friends with this amazing crossbody bag.Dimensions: 10&rdquo; W x 7&rdquo; H x 3&rdquo; D (Please note: width is measured across the bottom of the bag.)Here are some additional features to help you make an informed decision:- The bag has a coordinating lining with a fireworks motif, tying everything together beautifully- The crossbody style means you can go hands-free while exploring your own world- The printed details add an extra layer of depth to an already stunning piece- The bag is perfect for any Little Mermaid fan&mdash;whether you&rsquo;re young or young at heart, you can&rsquo;t go wrong with Ariel and her friends by your side.Product DetailsProduct type: Crossbody BagLicense: The Little MermaidManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 190 gram (7 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDTB2467GTIN: 671803403727
